review: Met all our expectations!  Easy to install, easy to program.  Had a little trouble navigating the remote until I looked it up on the internet and found out what all the buttons meant and how to navigate.  Including that information in the box would help.  We were worried our WiFi wasn't working, or sending a good enough signal, because our $1,000 plus blu-ray sound system would no longer connect to the internet.  So we were delighted when we plugged it in, and it connected with the internet immediately and we were able to start streaming movies with no stops for "buffering".  We are going to order another for our other not-so-smart TV.

review: I had little luck with the fire stick.  After multiple attempts to get it to work well and even getting a replacement, Amazon did give me a refund which was nice.  The layout and design is great.  Its just that the functionality is terrible.  Constant buffering on netflix and streaming apps ruined it for me.  Prime even buffered at times.  It seems the device is a great work in progress, but not worth the headache.
